item.title: About
item.description:
I get pretty excited about everything computers, but especially AI. Have worked as an applied AI scientist at Tractable and worked on Volvo’s self driving software. Making everyone smarter and more creative while fighting complexity at escherthink.com. You’ll probably find me thinking about some new idea or topic, hopefully an esoteric one.

With this website I am creating my own corner of the internet. Modern social media is pretty shit tbh. And making a website has never been easier. So instead of building my digital home on ground I would be renting, I am building it on land I do own. I recommend you do the same. Also because it is actually quite fun.
